project_abstract.cdata: The Third Oil Palm Project will be carried out from 1974 to 1979 and comprises: (a) plantings of 5,000 ha of high yielding oil palm by outgrowers, with the help of SODEPALM's technical and supervised credit services, to bring the total area of oil palm outgrow holdings to 30,000 ha; and, (b) planting or replanting 5,520 ha of high yielding oil palm, of which 400 ha will be new hybrid lines, on SODEPALM estates.
